title: Why no more missions?
body: Why did the missions stopped? Are they going to come back during the event?

replies.body:
Heeeeeey I thought I heard someone mention me. 

Those missions were a part of the Vs Event which ended on 6/29/2017. They'll be coming back around at some point, so be sure to check up on the [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) to know when they'll be back!

This quote can help you:

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Kw0syKXe,comment-id=00000004000000040000,timestamp=2017-07-07T20:39:43.857+0000)
>
> I'd actually love to see that screenshot because the official versus event page states:
>Q: What happens to my tokens after the event?
A: You’ll have until 7/24/17 23:59 PT to craft leftover tokens into batches of Blue Essence (every 10 tokens = 10 Blue Essence). If you don’t craft the tokens by the deadline, they will disappear.

That shows when they stopped and here is a [Surrender@20](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/05/dev-on-missions.html) article showing that missions may be reintroduced in the future as they are doing a dry run right now (well last month).

Good luck,

Galacius
